#include<iostream>
#define mod 1000000007
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
long long powr(long long base,long long power,long long M)
{
    if(power==0)
       return 1;
    if(power==1)
    return base;
    long long halfn=powr(base,power/2,M);
    if(power%2==0)
        return ( halfn * halfn ) % M;
    else
        return ( ( ( halfn * halfn ) % M ) * base ) % M;
}
int main()
{
    ll t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cout<<powr(2,n,mod)<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
